original_text:
Looking at his disciples, he said:
“Blessed are you who are poor,
    for yours is the kingdom of God.
korean_text: 예수께서 눈을 들어 제자들을 보시고 이르시되 너희 가난한 자는 복이 있나니 하나님의 나라가 너희 것임이요

sentences.original_text: Looking at his disciples, he said:
Blessed are you who are poor,
for yours is the kingdom of God.
